{{ddcl | 1=
constexpr basic_string_view
    substr(size_type pos = 0, size_type count = npos ) const;
}}

Returns a view of the substring {{tt|[pos, pos + rcount)}}, where {{tt|rcount}} is the smaller of {{tt|count}} and {{c|size() - pos}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par | pos | position of the first character}}
{{par | count | requested length}}
{{par end}} 

===Return value===
View of the substring {{tt|[pos, pos + rcount)}}.

===Exceptions===
{{lc|std::out_of_range}} if {{c|pos &gt; size()}}

===Complexity===
Constant.
